title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) Subdivision 25
of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that it shall be unlawful to operate on
any public highway or street in New York State, any commercial motor vehicle, combination of a commercial motor vehicle and trailer or combination of a
truck-tractor and semitrailer without being equipped with splash guards and
stone deflectors. (b) For the
purposes of this Part, the term splash guard shall be deemed to refer to splash
guards and stone deflectors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
47.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
